DOC.brief_summary: The study single-center randomize , unblinded , placebo-controlled study investigate effect pulmonary rehabilitation subject moderate chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Rehabilitation Subjects With Moderate Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: 1 . A diagnosis moderate COPD . 2 . Motivation Pulmonary rehabilitation . 1 . Comorbidity contraindicate rehabilitation . 2 . Participation pulmonary rehabilitation within last year . 3 . Cognitive disorder limit ability participate physical training education session .
